services.cleaningDescription: Professional cleaning services in different sizes
services.cleaningLongDescription: Our cleaning services are divided into three sizes according to your needs

s.title: S size – Basic cleaning
s.subtitle: For quick home refreshment
s.description: This type of cleaning is designed for those who need to clean quickly before a visit or want to relax after a busy day without dealing with mess.

m.title: M size – Regular cleaning
m.subtitle: For regular maintenance of cleanliness and order
m.description: This cleaning option is ideal for those who have already done a general cleaning and want to keep their home clean without unnecessary effort.

xl.title: XL size – General cleaning
xl.subtitle: Thorough cleaning of the entire apartment from floor to ceiling
xl.description: Suitable for those who want to have every corner perfectly clean, including hard-to-reach and commonly hidden places.

services.title: Our Services
services.whyChooseUsSubtitle: Reliable services with years of experience and highest quality

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: MoveCleanMafia ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

personalInformation.title: Personal Information
personalInformation.content: We may collect the following personal information:
items: Name and contact information (email, phone number)
Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)

automaticallyCollected.title: Automatically Collected Information
automaticallyCollected.content: When you visit our website, we automatically collect:

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:

informationSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except in the following circumstances:

items.title: Service Providers:
items.content: We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing services

items.title: Legal Requirements:
items.content: We may disclose information when required by law or to protect our rights and safety

items.title: Business Transfers:
items.content: In the event of a merger or acquisition, your information may be transferred

items.title: Consent:
items.content: We may share information with your explicit consent

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:
items: Encryption of data in transit and at rest

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. The retention period depends on:
items: The purpose for which it was collected

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights
yourRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:

items.title: Access:
items.content: Request a copy of your personal information

items.title: Deletion:
items.content: Request deletion of your personal information

items.title: Portability:
items.content: Request transfer of your data to another service

items.title: Objection:
items.content: Object to processing of your personal information

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our website. For detailed information about our use of cookies, please see our

internationalTransfers.title: 9. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and implement appropriate safeguards to protect your information.

childrensPrivacy.title: 10. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 16, please contact us immediately.

changesToPolicy.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the "Last updated" date.

contactInformation.title: 12. Contact Information
contactInformation.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

details.dpo: Data Protection Officer: [Contact information if applicable]

complaints.title: 13. Complaints
complaints.content: If you believe we have not handled your personal information in accordance with this Privacy Policy, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the relevant data protection authority in your jurisdiction.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the MoveCleanMafia website and services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: MoveCleanMafia provides cleaning, moving, and packing services. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our service at any time.

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
items: Provide accurate and complete information when booking services
Ensure access to the property for scheduled services
Secure valuable items before service provision
Notify us of any special requirements or concerns
Pay for services as agreed upon

booking.title: Booking:
booking.content: Services must be booked in advance through our website or by phone. Confirmation will be provided via email or SMS.

cancellation.title: Cancellation:
cancellation.content: Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours before the scheduled service. Late cancellations may incur a fee.

rescheduling.title: Rescheduling:
rescheduling.content: Changes to appointments can be made up to 24 hours before the scheduled time, subject to availability.

pricing.title: Pricing:
pricing.content: All prices are quoted in US Dollars (USD) and include taxes unless otherwise stated.

payment.title: Payment:
payment.content: Payment is due upon completion of services unless otherwise agreed. We accept cash, bank transfer, and card payments.

estimates.title: Estimates:
estimates.content: Service estimates are based on information provided and may be adjusted based on actual conditions.

ourLiability.title: Our Liability:
ourLiability.content: MoveCleanMafia is insured for general liability. We are responsible for damage caused by our negligence during service provision.

customerResponsibility.title: Customer Responsibility:
customerResponsibility.content: Customers are responsible for securing valuable items and ensuring safe access to the property.

limitation.title: Limitation:
limitation.content: Our liability is limited to the cost of the service provided or the actual value of damaged items, whichever is less.

privacyAndDataProtection.title: 7. Privacy and Data Protection
privacyAndDataProtection.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Our data collection and processing practices are outlined in our Privacy Policy, which forms part of these terms.

intellectualProperty.title: 8. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of MoveCleanMafia and is protected by copyright laws.

disputeResolution.title: 9. Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.content: Any disputes arising from these terms or our services will be resolved through negotiation, mediation, or legal proceedings in the United States.

changesToTerms.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of modified terms.

governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the United States. Any legal proceedings will be conducted in US courts.

termsOfService.legalNote: Note: This is a template Terms of Service. We recommend consulting with a legal professional to ensure compliance with local laws and regulations specific to your business and jurisdiction.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and analyzing how you use our site.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.content: We use cookies for several purposes:

items.title: Essential cookies:
items.content: These are necessary for the website to function properly

items.title: Analytics cookies:
items.content: These help us understand how visitors use our website

items.title: Preference cookies:
items.content: These remember your choices and settings

items.title: Marketing cookies:
items.content: These help us deliver relevant advertisements

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.content: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.content: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced, more personal features.

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: We may use third-party services that place cookies on your device:

items.title: Google Analytics:
items.content: For website analytics and performance monitoring

items.title: Google Maps:
items.content: For location services and map display

items.title: Social Media:
items.content: For social media integration and sharing

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings:
browserSettings.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Consent:
cookieConsent.content: When you first visit our website, you can choose which types of cookies to accept.

updatingPreferences.title: Updating Preferences:
updatingPreferences.content: You can change your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the "Customize" button in our footer.

sessionCookies.title: Session Cookies:
sessionCookies.content: These are temporary cookies that are deleted when you close your browser.

persistentCookies.title: Persistent Cookies:
persistentCookies.content: These remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them.

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies:
thirdPartyCookies.content: The duration of third-party cookies is determined by the respective service providers.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. The information collected through cookies is used in accordance with our Privacy Policy and applicable data protection laws.

updatesToPolicy.title: Updates to This Policy
updatesToPolicy.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:

cookieConsentManagement.title: Cookie Consent Management
cookieConsentManagement.content: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the "Customize" button in our website footer.

serviceDetail.ctaDescription: Get a free consultation and price quote. Our team is ready to help you with your needs.
